javadoc.text: * Reporting interface for basic univariate statistics.
* Returns the * arithmetic mean of the available values
javadoc.return: The mean or Double.NaN if no values have been added.

javadoc.text: * Returns the variance of the available values.
javadoc.return: The variance, Double.NaN if no values have been added * or 0.0 for a single value set.

javadoc.text: * Returns the standard deviation of the available values.
javadoc.return: The standard deviation, Double.NaN if no values have been added * or 0.0 for a single value set.

javadoc.text: * Returns the maximum of the available values
javadoc.return: The max or Double.NaN if no values have been added.

javadoc.text: * Returns the minimum of the available values
javadoc.return: The min or Double.NaN if no values have been added.

javadoc.text: * Returns the number of available values
* Returns the sum of the values that have been added to Univariate.
javadoc.return: The sum or Double.NaN if no values have been added
